item.title: #4 - Food Delivery
item.description: The Question: What makes you happy? The Topic: Let’s talk about food delivery services. The Viewermail: What’s the deal with beef?

item.title: #4 - Food Delivery
item.description: the_intro the_question What makes you happy? What is happiness? I would say there are two kinds to consider: Conditional and unconditional Being mentally balanced makes me happy the_topic Let’s talk about food delivery. I don’t get it. (nothing wrong with it) I think it comes down to lifestyle. Expensive. $10 is expensive. Hell, $5 is expensive. I like a cooked meal. I also don’t mind doing chores. the_viewermail Elena from Casa de piedra in argentina.
